name.baseName: Mine water treatment plant ; Bituminous coal and anthracite coal ; Bituminous coal and anthracite coal ; Surface mining ; less than 1.2 million t/a; NESPS2
矿井水处理站 ; 烟煤和无烟煤 ; 烟煤和无烟煤 ; 露天开采 ; 小于120万吨/年 ; 高富水矿区 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集涉及一个矿井水处理站，该站与烟煤和无烟煤的露天开采相关，其开采限额小于120万吨/年。末端处理设施旨在对采矿作业产生的废水污染进行治理。治疗包括针对化学需氧量污染物的物理方法和针对石油相关废物、汞和砷污染的化学处理。这套设备通常用于矿业，用于在排放到环境之前降低废水的环境影响。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码06,三级代码61.0,四级代码610文件，在完整版文件中第18页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution MercuryisChemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management83，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
污染物指标汞的末端治理技术是化学处理法，其效率为83，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施正常运行时间（天/年）/企业正常生产时间（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为汞，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
源文件中描述为为烟煤和无烟煤，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Petroleum-related wasteisChemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
污染物指标石油类的末端治理技术是化学处理法，其效率为85，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施正常运行时间（天/年）/企业正常生产时间（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为石油类，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the treatment technology for the pollution of Waste waterdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术未说明，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施正常运行时间（天/年）/企业正常生产时间（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution arsenicisChemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management83，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
污染物指标砷的末端治理技术是化学处理法，其效率为83，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施正常运行时间（天/年）/企业正常生产时间（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为砷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是物理处理法，其效率为85，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施正常运行时间（天/年）/企业正常生产时间（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
